author: Dr Ben Miles
description:
Planarian flatworms regenerate their entire bodies using signals from distant intestinal cells, challenging the long-held belief that stem cells are regulated only by their immediate neighbors. This discovery reveals a complex network of long-range cellular communication that could transform regenerative medicine approaches.

Source Article: https://www.sciencedaily.com/releases/2025/10/251029100156.htm
